column4: I also had a problem with a fresh install which wouldnt boot. I started again and the second time it worked with no problem - well at least it booted anyway. My problem was that the first time grub2 was not setup correctly. But the second time it worked. I didnt do anything different, just deleted the partitions and started again. Dont know if that will help but it may be quicker
thanks, i did a grub-udpdate also no avail. 2nd installation already :(
Sorry to hear that. I guess these are teething problems. Hopefully they will sort them soon. Hopefully the next LTS release will be more reliable
